html:
10.4.24  2:25 am   how do you deal with people asking about your next projects all the time?

      sometimes i wave back

10.4.24  1:36 am   I saw someone ask when are you going to do a face reveal and just lurking on your websites shows a video of you stacking books almost 20 years ago in what I can only assume is a dorm room

      you could lurk significantly less hard and discover that i play a starring role, physically, in a huge percentage of my music videos

10.4.24  12:58 am   Why isn't rock paper scissors an olympic sport yet?

      they keep doing rock paper scissors to decide, but it's always a tie

10.4.24  12:51 am   what time is it?

      i'm not sure, it's going by so fast

10.4.24  12:20 am   How do you get yourself to do stuff?

      the stuff would have to seem important to me

10.3.24  11:37 pm   when you write a lowercase i do you add the dot immediately, or add it in after finishing the word / sentence

      i'm not sure. i handwrite so infrequently

10.3.24  10:56 pm   If all of your fans formed a band, would you attend any of their concerts?

      that's probably too big for a band

10.3.24  10:25 pm   do you have a distaste for depressing things?

      i believe so

10.3.24  10:11 pm   can you read my mind

      no

10.3.24  10:11 pm   Were the sounds in la de da de da de da de day oh improvised? Did you have "La de da d-de dum de da, d-d-dim dwaayah d-de dum dweeAyy..." written down beforehand?

      that was written

10.3.24  8:53 pm   Is a hotdog technically a taco 

      with a little patience, it can be a soup

10.3.24  8:02 pm   What if I asked you to answer this question in exactly eight words, including one preposition?

      i would probably be able to do it

10.3.24  7:54 pm   how do i make daily schedules and stick to the damn schedules throughout the day? i must have tried doing this a thousand times over the last few years, but i can never seem to make something i actually stick to and execute on throughout the day, leading to a graveyard of attempted schedules that had very very little in common with how my actual day went. any advice? thanks

      maybe you're doing fine without a schedule

10.3.24  6:37 pm   you mentioned coping strategies for being yourself. i'm wondering what they are?

      songwriting, for example

10.3.24  6:18 pm   What should most people be doing better?

      everyone is doing just fine

10.3.24  6:08 pm   favorite ice cream flavor?

      flamin hot

10.3.24  5:40 pm   how do i pass my drivers test

      the most important thing is to figure out which side of the car is the front

10.3.24  5:39 pm   my voice sounds muddy when i record it

      perk up the eq and compress it

10.3.24  5:37 pm   If you could eat the sun would that have any side effects

      you'd want another one

10.3.24  5:34 pm   Do you like roblox

      maybe i could do 1 robloc at a time

10.3.24  4:55 pm   how commonplace are you?

      sometimes people think i'm them

10.3.24  4:29 pm   how much focus do I need to make it

      what you probably need is perseverence

10.3.24  1:19 pm   What's something new I can do when I'm bored and scrolling on my phone?

      pretend briefly that you don't have a phone

10.3.24  12:38 pm   Which part of making music came more naturally to you: the music production side, or the composing side?

      probably the composing

10.3.24  12:28 pm   Any advice for someone who just bought a harmonica and is gonna mess around with it and the music?

      not yet. everything seems to be going fine so far. let me know if you have any problems

10.3.24  12:17 pm   can i gaslight you please

      you can try

10.3.24  12:09 pm   you've made it pretty clear that you dislike most of your songs and videos,

     i don't recall ever saying that, and it's also not true per se

      even though many people think they are amazing. Do you think it is common for people to dislike their creations of all things, not just art?

      it's probably common to be very sensitive about it. the highs and lows may be very extreme

10.3.24  11:27 am   they loved my lemon loaf at the adhd support group

      that makes sense

10.3.24  10:54 am   tell me a fun fact about ancient egypt

      it's brand new

10.3.24  10:34 am   you are very cool and i like your music

      i'll admit that's very convenient for both of us

10.3.24  10:28 am   I thank you for the impact you've had on shaping the internet and how we interact with it everyday. Oh also, watermelons or bananas?

      i was gonna say check the label, but sometimes they are labeled wrong

10.3.24  9:28 am   I have some creative projects that I thoroughly enjoy, but I can get easily distracted and end up making disappointingly little progress. How much discipline is required from you to stay productive in your work? I gather it's almost effortless for you, and it makes me quite jealous.

      don't get into the trap of thinking everyone is doing better than you, and has it easier than you. it's never true, at least never in the cases where you think it is

10.3.24  8:51 am   Do you do intricate mixout/mastering on your released tunes, or do you just slam a limiter on them and that's it?

      it's maybe halfway between the 2 scenarios you described

10.3.24  7:23 am   have you recognised your cultural significance?

      i keep putting it off

10.3.24  7:06 am   how can your songs shine so much happiness onto me?

      i have no excuse

10.3.24  6:28 am   How do I make a good melody?

     you have to let the melody make you. i know that probably is not very convenient. i'm sorry about that

     Also, do you think millipedes are called millipedes because the scientists counted all the legs and got a million?

      that would be a strange reason, because scientists probably know that 'milli' means a thousand not a million

10.3.24  6:13 am   Any thoughts on Panpsychism? Do you lean towards agreeing or disagreeing with it?

      seems like it's on the right track

10.3.24  2:28 am   how do you comprehend the when the of these and that

      i might have to rearrange the words in space, and interpret them visually instead of linguistically

10.3.24  2:14 am   is this bus voluminous?

      just start putting things in it. and if you ever run out of spcae, then the answer is no

10.3.24  2:13 am   how would you like to live on the moon?

      it's a little sad and boring right now, but maybe later when it's more developed, and maybe if they could add some atmosphere or something

10.3.24  2:12 am   Do you play video games?

      not right now, but i could

10.3.24  1:30 am   do you know any languages besides english?

      just about

10.3.24  12:48 am   does anything matter?

      yes

10.3.24  12:32 am   Sometimes I come here and read lots and lots of your questions and answers, thinking I'll find something profound or funny, and usually I find both. Do you prefer profound or funny? 

      the main thing i find profound and funny is when you get both at the same time

10.3.24  12:28 am   opinion on project management?

      so crazy it just might work

10.2.24  11:59 pm   Do thoughts exist?

     sure

      How and when?

     in your mind, any time

     are they alive?

      i'd say so

10.2.24  10:30 pm   What is the best chess opening?

      a2-a4

10.2.24  10:17 pm   What color is a mirror?

      grey

10.2.24  8:17 pm   hi bill! theres this part of money at around 0:43 (also known as romp time) that sounds extremely similar to the melody of long long journey's "i remember the moment that my dreams were broken". ive asked people and they dont notice the similarities and its driving me insane. did you intend to make them sound alike?

      what drives me insane is that people think they're similar. they don't sound similar, it's not the same melody, but i've come to realize that in the videos they LOOK similar. so when someone says they sound similar, i usually assume they are "hearing with their eyes". if you were to tell me that when you tested it on other people you only played them the audio and not the video, this would further support my theory

10.2.24  7:51 pm   in 5 or less words, what's the overarching message of your entire career

      hi
